figure_1: Modified PRISMA (Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses) diagram detailing the collection of the top 50 most cited articles pertaining to meniscus injury.
figure_2: Correlation of the year of publication and citation density (r = 0.625; P < .001).
figure_3: Frequency of articles published per decade.
figure_5: Type of study, with the majority being related to clinical science and outcomes.
